name: Nogard
overview: A fantasy themed text only adventure. Later simple graphics would be added and it would be re-released as Maze of Nogard. Your king is at war and as an elite Nogard warrior you have been chosen to bring six items to him as he hides in his storeroom under a bed. You have only your official Nogard Warrior surplus Warlord Battlepack (a plastic bag), a newspaper and a pair of clean undies!
